ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] kunark level 21
ygData.msgSnippet: LoIO is awesome.  Lots of spawns, good spacing.  Easy to solo, good to group.  Easy to get to. If you are out for a lark, you can also try the forest giants in
ygData.messageBody:
LoIO is awesome. Lots of spawns, good spacing. Easy to solo, good to
group. Easy to get to.

If you are out for a lark, you can also try the forest giants in Warslik's
Woods (lotsa fun to kill giants at such a low level!). I did that a few
nights ago and it was fun. Not sure how good the exp was (didn't kill very
many was short on time) or the loot, but the novelty was great! Getting
Warslik's Woods isn't bad either, since you can go through the goblin mines
in LoIO invis.

Gilgurth
Bard of 22 Winces
E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: Peck White [mailto:pwhite@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 17, 2000 10:05 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] kunark level 21


Lake of Ill Omens is wonderful for low 20s. I've made almost 2 levels there
with only 1 death and I could've avoided that one except I was trying to
help a groupmate survive. There are no lists and the longest I've had to
wait for a group is about 10 minutes and (/em knocks on wood) the pickup
groups I've been in have all been very good.

There are plenty of wide open spaces so going solo is also a very viable
option. The directions to the LoIO are very simple and relatively safe with
selo's up.

Come on down,

Tomerrilin Loreweaver

-----Original Message-----
From: MICHELLE BODIE [mailto:LeiaOrgana@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 17, 2000 9:58 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] kunark level 21


Is there anywhere that a lvl 21 can fight on Kunark without being completely
slaughtered? :)
